title: Generational dilemmas: a response to Iris van der Tuin's ‘"Jumping Generations": on second- and third-wave feminist epistemology’
abstract:
Iris van der Tuin is surely right that feminist theorists need to challenge our linear generationalism, both in how we tell the story of the recent past and in how we occupy\ud
the present; a vibrant future for feminist epistemology depends on this
